document_data.name: Llyllanndra Havenstar
document_data.mainbody:
'''Llyllanndra Havenstar''' was a member of the [[Heralds of Faerûn]] and an assistant to [[Shalara Swordshigh]] during her tenure as [[Old Night]]. Llyllanndra lived in [[Herald's Holdfast]] during this time.{{Cite web/The Herald's Holdfast}}
